stateDiagram-v2
    [Security_IntrusionDetection] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Security_IntrusionDetection]
    Cancelled --> [Security_IntrusionDetection]

    state Created {Security_ZeroTrust] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Security_Firewall]
    }

    state InProgress {Security_Firewall] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Security_ZeroTrust]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Security_OAuth2] --> Blocked
        [Security_Firewall] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Security_ZeroTrust]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Security_Encryption]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Security_IntrusionDetection] --> Done
        [Security_Firewall] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Security_IntrusionDetection]
        PartiallyDone --> [Security_Firewall]
    }
